caption.p: ( a– d) Measured diffraction patterns from 3(10)OBC LC compound above ( a) and below ( b– d) the Sm-A–Hex-B phase transition. ( e– h) Corresponding reconstruction of the 2D pair distribution function (PDF). Development of the BO order and increase of the positional correlation length is visible in ( f– h). (adopted from Zaluzhnyy et al. [ 76]). Reproduced with permission of American Physical Society.
